entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump This is the nonsense you concern yourself with on a day when Florida logs in 15,300 new COVID-19 cases in ONE EFFING DAY!Good God,will you plz let someone qualified take the reins & help us?You love bashing Fauci w/overblown bullsh*t bc he didn’t back your killer cures & advise!
